body: When i said "at your end" i meant that something related to your machine. The file runs fine for me. It ends on an orange component (warning results), but the simulation finished. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9YUmk0mxLOJpxHDU7OCXXSIYJVQMRsUQ5rjHz2oDjSCfuEHaDk9RHONYJy8yOm5cWwoUTlCJ6lUfhK2qX-w8IiedJyZ*V7rs/Capture1.JPG)It even get results, though there are severe errors related to the previous mentiones issue with solar distribution: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9YUmk0mxLOIujf0BdkuGmjEhXvAttikloMBpRYT95fbLc07fAw-2qbqhdjYJnFUilhQnWTKIi07foegdBRnvcGSSFEZkiz-*/Capture.JPG)I changed the period form 12-2 to 1-3, since the BarChart has trouble going from month 12 to month 1 (there is a bug which i'll report on the github). -A.
